title: Funcn Configuration
description: Configuration for the Funcn CLI, specifying directories and aliases for agents, evals, prompts, and tools.

agentDirectory.description: The default directory for storing agents.

evalDirectory.description: The default directory for storing evals.

promptTemplateDirectory.description: The default directory for storing prompt templates.

toolDirectory.description: The default directory for storing tools.

responseModelDirectory.description: The default directory for storing standardized response model schemas for agents.

aliases.description: Import aliases for different component types.

defaultProvider.description: The default LLM provider for agents/tools.

stream.description: Whether to enable streaming responses by default for agents/tools.

defaultMcpHost.description: The default host for MCP-compatible agents.

defaultMcpPort.description: The default port for MCP-compatible agents.
